event.event-label: OpenNMS Service Now: Successfully sent event
event.descr: Successfully sent event via REST API for alarm with reduction key: %parm[reductionKey]%
event.logmsg: OpenNMS Service Now: Successfully sent event for alarm: %parm[reductionKey]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS Service Now: Failed to forward event
event.descr: Failed to sent event via REST API for alarm with reduction key: %parm[reductionKey]%. Message is: %parm[message]%
event.logmsg: OpenNMS Service Now: Failed to sent event for alarm: %parm[reductionKey]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS Service Now: Successfully sent asset
event.descr: Successfully sent asset via REST API for asset: %nodeid%
event.logmsg: OpenNMS Service Now: Successfully sent event for asset: %nodeid%

event.event-label: OpenNMS Service Now: Failed to forward asset
event.descr: Failed to sent event via REST API for alarm with reduction key: %nodeid%. Message is: %parm[message]%
event.logmsg: OpenNMS Service Now: Failed to sent event for alarm: %nodeid%
